newsitem.title: USA: MBIA qualifies nine muni issues for bond insurance.
newsitem.headline: MBIA qualifies nine muni issues for bond insurance.

text.p: MBIA Insurance Corp said it has qualified for bond insurance the following nine municipal issues scheduled for competitive sale today.
--West Boylston, Mass., $8.2 million of unlimited tax bonds.
--Fort Zumwalt S.D., Mo., $5 million school bonds.
--Cabarrus County, N.C., $49 million of GO bonds.
--Bethlehem, N.Y., $13.5 million of GO school bonds.
--Port Authority of New York and New Jersey $150 million of consolidated bonds, series 109.
--Wayland-Cohocton Central School District, N.Y., $9.6 million of GO bonds.
--Indian Area School District, Pa., $9.2 million of GO bonds.
--Washington County, Utah, $9.9 million public safety GOs.
